message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this item for sale at $150. I believe it offers excellent value at this price.
Hi Alice, I appreciate the offer, but $150 is a bit out of my budget.  I'm willing to pay $100 for the product.  Let me know what you think.
Hi Bob, I understand your budget constraints, but $150 is my bottom line.  I'm confident you won't find a better deal for this quality elsewhere.
